answers: Several ones, with some of them for specific purposes.

correct.text: OSM provides the following map tyles in its main page: Standard, CyclOSM, Cyclism, Transport, OPNVKarte and Humanitarian.

questions.prompt: How many map styles OpenStreetMap provides?

answers: You just need to provide a username, password and a valid email address.
questions.prompt: What do you need to open an account in OpenStreetMap?

answers: Just one, it is called iD.
Several ones, like JOSM, iD, Potlatch, Vespucci.
There are not editors available for the public.

correct.text: OSM can be modified with different editors, some from the computer (JOSM), some from the mobile (Vespucci, StreetComplete), some from browsers (iD, Potlatch, Level0).

questions.prompt: How many editors exist to modify OSM?

correct.text: You can check the different elements in these pages: https://learnosm.org/en/beginner/id-editor/ https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Elements

questions.prompt: What are the different kind of elements can be drawn on the map?
